title: Powering the Future Home: Energy Independence Starts Here
text:
TechCrunch was proud to host EcoFlow at Disrupt 2025 in San Francisco. Here’s an overview of their Roundtable session.

As blackouts, soaring energy prices, and aging grids challenge modern life, a new energy revolution is unfolding at home. Drawing on EcoFlow’s latest insights, where 60% of consumers demand grid independence, this session revealed how smart technologies, from ultra-fast storage to AI-driven energy prediction, are empowering households to take control. Attendees learned how EcoFlow is redefining the future of home energy with its intelligent ecosystem, transforming every home from a passive consumer into an active, self-sustaining power hub that fuels the future.

Presented by:
